findings.title: ASVS 14.4.x - Missing Security Headers
findings.description: No security headers detected in code
findings.recommendation: ASVS 14.4.3-7: Implement CSP, HSTS, X-Content-Type-Options, X-Frame-Options headers.

findings.title: SQL Injection
findings.code_snippet:
259 |                     search_term = content['search']
     260 |                     print(search_term)
>>>  261 |                     str_query = "SELECT first_name, last_name, username FROM customer WHERE username = '%s';" % search_term
     262 |                     # mycust = Customer.query.filter_by(username = search_term).first()
     263 |                     # return jsonify({'Customer': mycust.username, 'First Name': mycust.first_name}),200
findings.recommendation: Use parameterized queries or ORM. Never concatenate user input into SQL.

findings.title: Resource Exhaustion / DoS
findings.description: Reading entire file without size limit
findings.code_snippet:
325 | 
     326 |         with open(file_path, 'r') as yfile:
>>>  327 |             y = yfile.read()
     328 | 
     329 |         ydata = yaml.load(y)
findings.recommendation: Implement rate limiting, timeouts, and resource constraints.

findings.title: JWT Security Issue
findings.code_snippet:
95 | 
      96 | def insecure_verify(token):
>>>   97 |     decoded = jwt.decode(token, verify = False)
      98 |     print(decoded)
      99 |     return True
findings.recommendation: Always verify JWT signatures. Use strong secrets (32+ chars). Avoid 'none' algorithm.

findings.title: Advanced Deserialization Risk
findings.description: YAML load without SafeLoader - code execution risk
findings.code_snippet:
327 |             y = yfile.read()
     328 | 
>>>  329 |         ydata = yaml.load(y)
     330 | 
     331 |     return render_template('view.html', name = json.dumps(ydata))
findings.recommendation: Never deserialize untrusted data. Use JSON or safe alternatives to pickle/yaml.load.
findings.owasp_category: A08:2021 - Software and Data Integrity Failures

findings.title: Insecure File Upload
findings.code_snippet:
292 |     if request.method == 'POST':
     293 | 
>>>  294 |         f = request.files['file']
     295 |         rand = random.randint(1, 100)
     296 |         fname = secure_filename(f.filename)
findings.recommendation: Validate file extensions, use secure_filename(), scan for malware, store outside webroot.

findings.title: ASVS 2.1.7 - Weak Password Storage
findings.code_snippet:
139 |             username = content['username']

findings.recommendation: ASVS 2.1.7: Use bcrypt, scrypt, Argon2, or PBKDF2 for password hashing.
